Communication.Answer: came to this hospital because of difficulty of breathing.

Communication.Question: When were you started/experienced /first short of breath (at exercise or at rest)?
Communication.Answer: I used to get breathless while doing heavy farmer work but since last 2 years it has gradually increased and now I am short of breath at rest also.

Communication.Question: How long /since/days/months/weeks have you been short of breath? Is it getting worse?
Communication.Answer: Since last 15 days I get breathless  after doing activities of daily living

Communication.Question: What are the factors thatincrease /Aggravates  your Shortness of breath/breathlessness?
Communication.Answer: Since 15 days little difficulty in doing Activities of Daily living before that stop for breath after walking 100m

Communication.Answer: Since 15 days little difficulty in doing Activities of Daily living before that stop for breath after walking 100m

Communication.Question: Do you have complain of cough ,How frequently and when do you cough?
Communication.Answer: Yes. Increased since last 15 days. But usually there on and off since last 3 to 4 years.

Communication.Question: What are the exaggerate/aggravating /increases and settle /relievingfactors for cough?
Communication.Answer: As such there is no relieving and aggravating factor but in between I used while working in farm fields.
